description.english: Completed the Kronos Island tutorials.

description.english: Defeated the Titan and completed the main story on Kronos Island.
description.german: Den Titanen von Kronos Island besiegt und die Hauptstory abgeschlossen.
description.french: A vaincu le titan et terminé l'histoire principale de Kronos Island.
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il Titano e completato la storia principale su Kronos Island.

description.tchinese: 已打倒克洛諾斯島的巨神並通關所有主線劇情
